scripts.prepare-release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:a11y && npm run build
scripts.smoke:run: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const pkgPath=process.env.npm_package_json; let repoRoot; if(pkgPath){ repoRoot=path.resolve(path.dirname(pkgPath),'..'); } else { const cwd=process.cwd(); repoRoot = path.basename(cwd)==='frontend' ? path.resolve(cwd,'..') : cwd; } console.log('Running gated smoke tests (repo root:', repoRoot, ')'); const env=Object.assign({}, process.env, { RUN_E2E_SMOKE: 'true' }); const res=spawnSync('npx', ['vitest','run','--config','./vitest.config.js','--reporter','json'], { env, cwd: pkgPath ? path.dirname(pkgPath) : process.cwd(), encoding: 'utf8' }); if(res.error){ console.error(res.error); process.exit(1); } fs.writeFileSync(path.join(repoRoot,'frontend-full-results.json'), res.stdout || ''); console.log('Wrote report to', path.join(repoRoot,'frontend-full-results.json')); process.exit(res.status || 0);"
